explains: v. 尊敬，敬重；重视；珍视（respect 的过去式和过去分词）
wordGroup: respected ideas 公认理论；权威理论

sentences.en: It was clear to me that he respected his boss.
sentences.cn: 在我看来，显然他尊重他的老板。

sentences.en: I think you'd agree he's a very respected columnist.
sentences.cn: 我想你可能会同意，他是个十分受人尊敬的专栏作家。

sentences.en: He was in his late eighties and had become the country's most respected elder statesman.
sentences.cn: 那时他年近九十，并且已经成为该国最受尊敬的政界元老。
